channel.title: "Connection lost, trying to re-establish."
channel.description: I keep getting the message "Connection lost, trying to re-establish." (OR something similar to that, I may be a few words off) when trying to log into servers. It has just recently started happening, and it has happened on two different servers. Help?

item.title: "Connection lost, trying to re-establish."
item.dc:creator: @sirPink sirPink
item.description:
@sirPink wrote:

I keep getting the message “Connection lost, trying to re-establish.” (OR something similar to that, I may be a few words off) when trying to log into servers. It has just recently started happening, and it has happened on two different servers. Help?

Read full topic
